comment: I made A's on everything all semester then I somehow ended up with a B solely because she had different views than me.

She is extremely easy, but I got a "B" because she said too many people got "A"'s...? And she usually would try to bring up, and argue against, people who are religious during class. Definitely take her for easiness, though. You're usually only in class for around 20 minutes anyway.

I'm going to agree with a previous poster who says she gives you your grade without reading. She gave me a 0 on a paper, assuming that I didn't speak English, and later corrected it when she actually read my assignment. I learned nothing, and she did absolutely nothing, but it was a VERY easy class.

You get to pick your own topic for most of your papers. I took her for 1101 and 1102. Class is not mandatory but you never know when she will have graded in class assignments. Never spends the entire time in class. Oh and do not purchase the books!

At times it felt like she was giving you the grade she thought you'd get if she actually read your paper. If she likes you, you'll get an A on just about everything. If she doesn't, you might have to work for it. Being able to write a decent paper helps. It probably gets tiring reading crappy papers all day, reading something fresh makes her happy.
Ok, teacher, but really early class, my last 8am class for the rest of my life.  She is very unique, you should write about stuff that she seems to be in favor of, but a VERY EASY class.

she is a very nice lady but can't teach. she is never clear about what she wants, she gives you these simple instructions on a paper. then when you turn it in and get it back she has it all marked up saying you needed this or you needed that. you never know what she wants. unless you are an expert paper writer don't take her class.
If you want an easy A, take her.  She lets you leave class right after finishing your assignments.  If you want to learn something, though, take someone else.

Mrs. Bolen is def. "out there". Class is over as soon as you finish the assignment for the day (usually takes 20 min). There are 3 papers (3,5,7 pages) you work on them in class everyday. She grades really easy but by "her" terms not really what the book says. It's an easy A and virtually recycled old english papers i had written. EASY, EASY, EASY!

She is a very easy teacher! Super easy assignments, you rarely will stay the entire calss she always lets you leave early. She is totally weird but its ok because she is so easy and even lets you turn work in late! If you have her you are lucky because you wont have to worry about English being a problem

She is a little crazy!! Her random comments keep you laughing and she usually has no idea what is really going on in class! You could get away with murder...however, her class is an excellent opportunity to make an easy grade without a ton of effort. Come to class, do the assignments, which arent hard, and you'll do really well!!! Dont act like an

She SUCKS as a professor! She isn't clear with her instructions at all! She told me that i was missing a page in the portfolio but when i looked through it, it was in there with everything else! She is so unorganized. She loses everything! It's not worth wasting your time and money!
She is not a good teacher.  We don't do anything in class.  If you want to be graded fairly don't take her, otherwise she will give you a B because too many people have an A.  BAD

EASY EASY EASY..You have to show up to class each day to complete a silly assignment which usually doesn't take more than 30mins.  The only major assignments are the midterm and final portlios. WHich consists of the writings done in clas. It doesn't seem like she ACTUALLY reads the papers. As long as you write something, theres your grade.

An easy A if you are willing to come to class (occasionally) and write a 1pg essay on basic topics. She grades on a 3pt system which somehow translates as an A-C. I don't believe she read any of my work.. ever. As a teacher, Bolen is flighty, unclear and I wouldn't expect to learn anything I didn't already pick up in 3rd grade English.

Although not the most clear or intelligent, Dr. Bolen is one of the easiest professors I've had a KSU. Period. No tests or quizzes, you don't have to open the book, or even come to class. Your grade is based on daily writing assignments (page each) on various topics from abortion to writing a letter. An easy grader and easy class. Recommend it!

Very nice lady.  I don't understand a previous rater's comment about her having a  problem with students' topic choices as I found her to be quite openminded about such things.  Anyway, I enjoyed both her and her class.

You'd have to be a really horrible writer to not do well in this class. The assignments aren't too bad, but it's hard to understand what she wants from you most of the time. You barely have to show up, and you'll rarely be there for more than an hour.

Wouldn't recommend her. The class is pretty easy but she isn't the smartest person in the world. She goes by what she knows only. She wasn't willing to look at another view. If you wrote about a topic she didn't care for, sorry you got a B. However if you wrote about Cats, there is your A.

This is very easy class, and she is pretty nice. She is very laid back and eccentric. She doen't mind taking late assignments and essays. As long as you turn in the essays (3 i think) and do in-class assignments, you'll get a good grade.

She is laid back and congenial.  You really have to work (very hard) to get less than an A.  The assignments are easy and so are the papers.  Over all, the class was enjoyable.  I only used one out of three of the text books, though.
She was very nice..a bit flighty and blonde(i guess you would say) but very nice. Easy class as long as you come to class and do the 1 assignment a day you should get an A.

She's a really nice teacher and she's very easy.  You probably won't stay in her class for more than an hour!  She gives the assignment and once you finish you can leave.  She's kinda eccentric and a little funny.  It's really an easy A.

never again.  gave assignments, then didn't take them up after we worked forever on them.  didn't even look at portfolio that took place of final, just marked gradebook with her pre-conceived grade.  truly bad experience
No Comments
No Comments
No Comments
easy, easy, easy A
Not good

An easy class.  Three papers, (with PLENTY of time to complete them) along a few reading/writing tasks done during classtime.  Ms. Bolen is gracious when it comes accepting late papers w/o deductions.  Just don't take advantage of her goodwill.  She knows who's for real and who is just slacking off.
